name: Daily T-7 Amzaon Order Details Incremental Load

activities.name: Get Max Date from Order Detail

source.sqlReaderQuery: Select convert(varchar, DateAdd(DD,-7,max(order_date)), 23)  as maxdate from Amazon_OMS_Order_Details_staging

dependsOn.activity: Get Max Date from Order Detail

query.value:
SELECT 
DISTINCT 
ws.sale_id AS Order_Id
,ws.sale_code
,ws.created_date AS Order_Date
,STR_TO_DATE(ws.processing_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as processing_date
,STR_TO_DATE(ws.invoice_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as invoice_date
,ws.user_name AS Customer_Name
,ws.Customer_id
,ws.store_id
,wd.rx_type AS RX_type
,wd.product_id
,wd.mrp
,wd.price
,wd.quantity
,ws.coupon_discount AS discount_on_order
,ws.coupon_code
,ws.grand_total
,ws.order_invoice_amt
,ws.txn_status
,ws.payment_type AS Payment_mode
,ws.online_TXN
,ws.ERP_transactionid AS ERP_Id
,ws.order_invoice_no AS Invoice_no
,ws.delivery_status AS Order_Status
,ws.partial_invoice
,ws.DMS_jobid
,ws.dman_id
,ws.dman_name
,ws.thirdPartyJobStatus
,ws.three_pl_name
,STR_TO_DATE(ws.DMS_eta_IST,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS Actual_Delivery_date
,STR_TO_DATE(ws.delivered_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS Delivered_date
,ws.cancel_reason
,ws.remark
,ws.MFM_timeframe
,ws.sale_platform
,ws.dman_payment_status AS Reconciled
,ws.collected_amount AS Collected_amount
,p.item_code
,concat(ws.store_id, '/', ws.sale_id, '/', p.item_code) as brcode_orderid_itemcode_key
,ws.order_parent_id
,ws.buyer
FROM wellnessDB.order_details wd
LEFT JOIN wellnessDB.sale ws ON wd.sale_id = ws.sale_id
left JOIN setproduct_items sp ON sp.set_id=wd.product_id
left JOIN product p ON sp.product_id=p.product_id
WHERE
STR_TO_DATE(ws.created_date,'%Y-%m-%d') >='@{activity('Get Max Date from Order Detail').output.firstRow.maxdate}'
AND wd.status = 1 and ws.sale_platform='6' and p.item_code IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY ws.sale_id ASC

preCopyScript.value:
Delete from Amazon_OMS_Order_Details_staging where 
convert(date,order_date) >='@{activity('Get Max Date from Order Detail').output.firstRow.maxdate}'
